Jiu Qu Hong Mei

Jiu Qu Hong Mei, or Red Plum, is a sweet and fruity black tea from China.

Popularity

Appreciated for its fruity and floral notes, making it a favorite among tea lovers.

Origin

Grown in the Jiuqu district of Zhejiang Province, known for its delicate processing.

Harvest Notes

Harvested in spring and summer, using tender leaves for a refined flavor.

Brewing methodes

Steep one teaspoon of Jiu Qu Hong Mei in water heated to 90°C-95°C (194°F-203°F) for 3-4 minutes.

Health Benefits

May support digestion and provide a gentle energy boost.
